mapper.select: select * from good where good_status>0 order by id desc limit 2000
mapper.update: update good set good_status = #{val} where id=#{id};
mapper.insert: insert into good(seller_id, good_tag, `name`, description, good_status, price, last_price, picture_url) values (#{seller_id}, #{good_tag}, #{name}, #{description}, #{good_status}, #{price}, #{last_price},#{picture_url});
